name: image-resizer
author: Eliot van Uytfanghe (http://eliotvu.com) <me@eliotvu.com>
description: Resize/Scale any image on the web by dragging at the image!
creator: Netliot

preferences.name: mouseDragButton
preferences.title: Use RMB
preferences.description: Whether RMB(Right Mouse Button) is the button used to resize images. LMB if disabled

preferences.name: showHoverMessage
preferences.title: Display Image Tooltip
preferences.description: Whether to show the resizing tooltip on images

preferences.name: freeScaling
preferences.title: Free X/Y Scaling
preferences.description: If enabled, dragging in the X direction will scale the height and vice-versa for Y, instead of scaling it equally

preferences.name: controlEnables
preferences.title: Hold CTRL to Enable
preferences.description: Reverses the logic of holding CTRL, when enabled you will have to hold down CTRL before resizing, instead of disabling when holding CTRL down
